attr.title: Canto I
attr.desc: Face the Dark Forest of the Divine Comedy in this action platformer inspired by the Sommo Poetaâ€™s masterpiece! Help Dante avoid pitfalls, spikes & specters using double jumps, magical attacks and dashes. Find the scrolls containing the triplets of the Canto exploring this gloomy, pixelart forest!
attr.inst: Download the game for FREE on Steam and add the "CantoI.exe" into the gamedata folder.
